## Python Data Analysis

```{python}
import pandas as pd
import matplotlib.pyplot as plt

data = {
    'Month': ['Jan', 'Feb', 'Mar', 'Apr'],
    'Sales': [240, 300, 450, 400]
}
df = pd.DataFrame(data)

plt.figure(figsize=(8, 4))
plt.bar(df['Month'], df['Sales'])
plt.title('Monthly Sales')
plt.xlabel('Month')
plt.ylabel('Sales')
plt.show()
